Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale red pottery vessel, the fabric contains a number of small white inclusions, the exterior is grooved and covered with a red-brown slip and remains of five lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393898) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393898)
